original_text: And they brought him upon horses, and he was buried with his fathers in the city of David.
korean_text: 그의 시체를 말에 실어다가 그의 조상들과 함께 유다 성읍에 장사하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they brought him upon horses,
and he was buried with his fathers in the city of David.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다윗 성에서 그의 조상들과 함께 장사되었습니다
